ArgonTest.Name: Swap tuple
ArgonTest.InputSource:
module _
import Argon.Core::*
proc printTuple(a: String, b: String): () do puts a puts b end
def swapTuple(a: String, b: String): (String, String) = b, a
proc main(): () do let tupleValue: (String, String) = "1", "2" printTuple (swapTuple tupleValue) end
